org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu

Class MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.gui.menu.MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor
  • Enclosing class:
    MenuFactory

    public static class MenuFactory.ComponentDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is used to describe a menu or an action.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

                           java.lang.String location,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String mnemonic,
                           java.lang.String accelerator,

                           java.lang.String large_icon,
                           java.lang.String style,
                           java.lang.String group,
                           boolean separator,
                           boolean existing)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        cls_name - the class name
        cls - the class of this component
        container - the container of this component
        location - the location of this component
        name - the name of this component
        mnemonic - the mnemonic of this component
        accelerator - the accelerator of this component
        tooltip - the tooltip text of this component
        small_icon - the small icon of this component
        large_icon - the large icon of this component
        style - the style of this component
        group - the group of this component
        separator - indicates if there should be a separator before this component
        existing - indicates if there is a class with name cls_name
